column5: Thank you for sharing so openly. Your description resonates with me too. I have made art  and written expressive poetry during some of my depression journeys. When I read your words, and reflect on the depth of the meaning...it makes me want to read more of your writing. Sending you positive energy.

My chronic illnesses make the physical act of sitting up and getting out of bed painful. My back, joints, hands and feet radiate pain. Sometimes when I successfully get out of bed with the most ease given my body-- it feels like a win.
